definitions.definition: Originally, the DuPont company trade name for polyamide , a copolymer whose molecules consist of alternating diamine and dicarboxylic acid monomers bonded together; now generically used for this type of polymer .
A stocking originally fabricated from nylon; also used generically for any long, sheer stocking worn on a woman's legs.
examples: I tore a hole in my nylons while walking home through the woods.

definitions.definition: A Queen's Counsel , King's Counsel or Senior Counsel who was appointed as a courtesy, rather than on merit.

main_definition: Originally, the DuPont company trade name for polyamide , a copolymer whose molecules consist of alternating diamine and dicarboxylic acid monomers bonded together; now generically used for this type of polymer .
secondary_definitions: ( in the plural ) A stocking originally fabricated from nylon; also used generically for any long, sheer stocking worn on a woman's legs.
( perjoratively, by comparison to silk ) A Queen's Counsel , King's Counsel or Senior Counsel who was appointed as a courtesy, rather than on merit.
